"016a", "The trading platform is opened, " "not the page of the corresponding trading instrument on the trading platform", False, False ) link = apply_preconditions_to_link(d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country_1_rnd_from_2, cur_role, cur_login, cur_password) menu = MenuSection(d, link) cur_item_link = None match cur_market_1_rnd_from_5: case "Shares": cur_item_link = menu.open_shares_market_menu(d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country_1_rnd_from_2, link) case "Forex": cur_item_link = menu.open_forex_markets_menu(d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country_1_rnd_from_2, link) case "Indices": cur_item_link = menu.open_indices_markets_menu(d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country_1_rnd_from_2, link) case "Commodities": cur_item_link = menu.open_commodities_markets_menu(d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country_1_rnd_from_2, link) case "Cryptocurrencies": cur_item_link = menu.open_cryptocurrencies_market_menu(d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14, cur_country_1_rnd_from_2, link) test_element = TradePageAddToFavoriteButton(d, cur_item_link, bid) > test_element.full_test( d, cur_language_2_rnd_from_14,
